transcript:
old colonel: 
"Gentlemen, I thank you all; all arms have behaved heroically: infantry, cavalry, and ar- tillery. How was it that two guns were aban- doned in the center?" he inquired, searching with his eyes for someone. (Prince Bagrati6n did not ask about the guns on the left flank; he knew that all the guns there had been aban- doned at the very beginning of the action.) "I think I sent you?" he added, turning to the staff officer on duty.
